00007 // ----- define enum type PixelFormatFlag16 -------//

00009 enum PixelFormatFlag {
00010     PIXFORM_RGB_555 = 0,                            // red on low bits
00011     PIXFORM_RGB_565 = 1,
00012     PIXFORM_BGR_555 = 2,                            // blue on low bits
00013     PIXFORM_BGR_565 = 3,
00014 };
